content: The reason that these laws have been enacted, is to suppress the vote. going on since Nixon and then Reagan’s “war on drugs” made it easier to disenfranchise voters. Look at Nixon’s stand against his own marijuana commission. This commission’s report said that marijuana posed no . addiction and was benign next to alcohol. But Nixon ignored the report and re classified marijuana as a class 1 drug. John Ehrlichman wrote in his book, that Nixon did it to disenfranchise people of color and hippies. Then Reagan’s policies put the voter suppression on steroids, with his war on drugs. All political with no bases in reality. Drug addiction should be handled by the Medical Community, not law enforcement.
